title: Can I use community asset to pay off community debt during divorce?
question: Can I use my HSA account to pay off Marital Medical Debt after divorce filed without agreement?
answers: I suggest discussing with your spouse.
No as your spouse has a right to the community assets. You are best to get your spouse to agree in writing to doing this.
